summary: HPD is a mental health condition where people act in very dramatic and attention-seeking ways. They often start this behavior in their early adult years. People with HPD are usually very outgoing and flirtatious. They crave attention and approval, and they might do things that are sexually suggestive to get it. They can also be easily swayed by others. This disorder is part of a group called "Cluster B" personality disorders.
title: Histrionic personality disorder
